# limel-spinner



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                         | Type                                                    | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Determines the size of the spinner. | `"large" \| "medium" \| "mini" \| "small" \| "x-small"` | `'mini'` |
